entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Carleton-sur-Mer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
